A seasonable discourse wherein sincerity & delight in the service of God is earnestly pressed upon professors of religion delivered on a publick fast at Cambridge in New-England, by the reverend and learned Urian Oakes, late pastor of the church there, and president of Harvard Colledge. Oakes, Urian, 1631-1681.
[6], 33 p.
Printed by Samuel Green, Cambridge [Mass.] : 1682.
Imperfect: print showthrough with loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
